relation.text: 1807 . My dear Sister Mr : Fletcher proposes
Tell my dear Louisa that this day
tomorrow ( if my father is tolerably well ) to Manchester when I propose
obliged to my Brother for the presentation , & medicine for the horse , he is now
will be more productive than their predeceſsors . I am not now
tell you of the flowers in my garden about the 10 th to 1 5 th of January
roses purple primrose snow drop hepatica aconite oxlip heartsease bearsfoot , yellow & white potentilla Italian cytiſsus Christmas
continues in excellent mind & the marriage of a third cousin to a man of 4000 a year
a final stop to all intercourse of every kind , I am not now
